text: Whispers in the Fog is the 153rd volume in the Nancy Drew Mystery Stories series. It was first published in April 2000 by Pocket Books.Whispers in the Fog at WorldCat ==Plot summary== Nancy, Bess, George, and Ned travel to California to stay with George's kayaking trainer, Katie Firestone. They discover that her whale-watching boat has been vandalized, endangering her business. By land and sea, Nancy investigates the mysterious tiny town where Katie lives. ==Adaptation== The ninth installment in the Nancy Drew point-and- click adventure game series by Her Interactive, named Nancy Drew: Danger on Deception Island, is loosely based on the novel. ==References== Category:Nancy Drew books Category:2000 American novels Category:2000 children's books Category:Novels set in California Category:Novels adapted into video games Category:Pocket Books books
title: Whispers in the Fog
